author: pburba
msg: Create new branch, "reduce-wc-walks-for-mergeinfo", to explore the
possibility of walking the WC only once per merge rather than once for each
normalized merge source.  This could provide a substantial performance
boost for merges into large working copies.  This applies *only* when

author: hwright
msg: * CHANGES: Add section for 1.5.3, with initial content.

author: hwright
msg: Update build.conf to remove the magic word 'update' from the description to

Not a code change. Just makes it possible to run the tests as non-

msg: Merge r32790, r32796, r32798 from trunk:
